name: Gigs
headline: Stripe for phone plans.
description:
At Gigs, we're building the operating system for mobile services - a platform that enables tech companies to seamlessly embed connectivity into their products.

Just as Stripe enables businesses to embed a payment button into any product, Gigs enables businesses to add a connect button and issue SIMs with a single click or API call. From fintechs launching mobile services to HRIS platforms offering work phone plans, we automate phone plan provisioning.

We're solving complex technical, operational and regulatory challenges to make connectivity truly effortless. We've grown to a team of around 90 people across the US and Europe, bringing together an experienced team of early-stage engineers, product builders and business athletes from companies like Stripe, Airbnb and Shopify. We know what it takes to solve hard problems.

With almost $100MM in funding from Ribbit Capital, Google and Y Combinator, Gigs is one of the fastest growing tech companies. Building on our strong foundation, we’re looking for exceptional candidates who want to do the best work of their lives in a high-paced environment, surrounded by a highly talented, ambitious team.

You’ll be joining at an exciting inflection point in our company’s history. At sub-100 people and with a year of hyper-growth ahead of us, opportunity is abundant.

# Launch a mobile service like magic
Everything you need to launch phone and data plans, all in one place. Wholesale connectivity, checkout, payments, tax and compliance. We’ve built it, so you don’t have to.
[Speak to Gigs](https://gigs.com/</contact>)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F4929x1769%2Fb5583a6e8b%2Fhomepage-hero-att-larger.jpg&w=3840&q=85)

Products
### The telecom operating system
Start selling eSIMs and SIM cards with talk, text and data on the world’s best networks. Mix and match Gigs’ integrated suite of products to launch your own branded mobile service, and watch the revenue roll in.
No-code mobile service
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F3136x1320%2Fda8f3bf385%2Fproducts-connect.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</connect>)
Successful signups with Connect
Launch a checkout and comprehensive plan management site in your own branding, without writing a single line of code.
[Connect](https://gigs.com/</connect>)

All-in-one Payments
Manage recurring billing, refunds, taxes and payouts without integrating a 3rd party payment provider.
[Payments](https://gigs.com/</payments>)

Use Cases
### Powered by Gigs
Our customers are at the forefront of telecom innovation, without ever needing to be experts in the field. Explore the experiences powered by Gigs.
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1248x1249%2F6608a0e3fd%2Fuse-cases-1.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</devices>)[Device and SIM](https://gigs.com/</devices>)
Ship new devices with SIMs already embedded. Allow your customers to scan a QR code, choose a plan, and start using their device in minutes.
[Devices](https://gigs.com/</devices>)
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1248x1249%2Ff1f624c042%2Fuse-cases-2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</fintech>)[Bank card and phone plan](https://gigs.com/</fintech>)
Offer phone plans at home, and travel data abroad. Give your users the power to manage both their banking and their mobile plan from one app.
[Fintech](https://gigs.com/</fintech>)
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1248x1249%2F4557132039%2Fuse-cases-3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</broadband>)[Internet and mobile](https://gigs.com/</broadband>)
Become the ultimate connectivity provider for your customers. Combine broadband and mobile in a single offering for even more convenience.
[Broadband](https://gigs.com/</broadband>)
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1248x1248%2Fd54b02dfca%2Fuse-cases-4-hrtech.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</hr-tech>)[Employee and phone plan](https://gigs.com/</hr-tech>)
Deliver phone plans to employees through your HR, IT or MDM platform. Provide roaming data packages for business travel.
[HR Tech](https://gigs.com/</hr-tech>)
[![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1248x1249%2F155999d9fd%2Fuse-cases-5.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://gigs.com/</travel>)[Travel and roaming data](https://gigs.com/</travel>)
Keep your customers connected with roaming data packages. Position your travel SIM offer at the point of sale for flights, rides or hotel bookings.
[Travel](https://gigs.com/</travel>)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1260x1260%2F861bb7dd07%2Fuse-cases-6.jpg&w=3840&q=75)Brand and mobile
Are you someone’s favorite brand, sports club or creator? Create deeper connections and offer exclusive perks with your own branded mobile service.

Customer Insights
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2Fb3baa1600a%2Fnubank_card-10gb.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2F7cab9a9faa%2Fnubank_card-premium.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2F5256830196%2Fnubank_card-30days.png&w=3840&q=75)
Gigs was an easy choice for launching our own travel eSIM. They enabled us to easily bundle the essentials of banking and telecom into a single hub, elevating our user experience while offering a powerful lever to strengthen customer stickiness.
Pedro Bridi,
Senior Product Manager, Nubank
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/231660/71x39/b074d06158/nubank_logo.svg)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2Fb3baa1600a%2Fnubank_card-10gb.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2F7cab9a9faa%2Fnubank_card-premium.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2F5256830196%2Fnubank_card-30days.png&w=3840&q=75)
Then
The only path to launching a mobile service is via a mobile operator or a wholesaler. The process takes 12-15 months, costs millions, and requires dedicated in-house telecom engineering, regulatory and support teams. You aim to break even within a few years of launching, but there are no guarantees.
Now
Telecom has an operating system. Implementation happens in weeks, or even days. You get a positive return on investment from day one, and pay as you earn. Your focus is on customer experience and product innovation, not achieving high volume commitments to break even.
### Be the mobile provider you always dreamed of.
Do the best work of your life
![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F2052x1540%2F55695cebf6%2Fcareers-promo-image-main.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
We’re hiring!
### Careers at Gigs
Bi-annual offsites. Remote first culture. Hubs in SF, London and Berlin. Join us to experience real innovation in a world-class team.
Do the best work of your life
Join teammates from the world’s top tech companies to build the future of telecom.
A startup for grown ups
This isn’t our first rodeo. Work hard, move fast, and achieve impossible things in an experienced team.
[See open roles](https://gigs.com/</careers>)

The __cf_bm cookie supports Cloudflare Bot Management by managing incoming traffic that matches criteria associated with bots. The cookie does not collect any personal data, and any information collected is subject to one-way encryption.

Used by LinkedIn for routing.  
li_gc| .linkedin.com| [LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company](https://gigs.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy>)| 180 days  
Used by LinkedIn to store consent of guests regarding the use of cookies for non-essential purposes  
lang| .linkedin.com| Session  
Session-based cookie that remembers the user's selected language version of a website.  
**Analytical cookies**
Analytical cookies help us improve our website by collecting and reporting information on its usage.
Analytical cookiesName| Hostname| Vendor| Expiry  
---|---|---|---  
_ga_| .gigs.com| [Google](https://gigs.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 400 days  
Contains a unique identifier used by Google Analytics 4 to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
_ga| .gigs.com| [Google](https://gigs.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 400 days  
Contains a unique identifier used by Google Analytics to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
__hstc| .gigs.com| [HubSpot](https://gigs.com/<https:/legal.hubspot.com/privacy-policy>)| 180 days  
This cookie name is associated with websites built on the HubSpot platform. This is the main cookie for tracking visitors. It contains the domain, utk, initial timestamp (first visit), last timestamp (last visit), current timestamp (this visit), and session number (increments for each subsequent session).  
hubspotutk| .gigs.com| [HubSpot](https://gigs.com/<https:/legal.hubspot.com/privacy-policy>)| 180 days  
This cookie name is associated with websites built on the HubSpot platform. This cookie is used to keep track of a visitor's identity. This cookie is passed to HubSpot on form submission and used when deduplicating contacts.  
__hssrc| .gigs.com| [HubSpot](https://gigs.com/<https:/legal.hubspot.com/privacy-policy>)| Session  
This cookie name is associated with websites built on the HubSpot platform. Whenever HubSpot changes the session cookie, this cookie is also set to determine if the visitor has restarted their browser. If this cookie does not exist when HubSpot manages cookies, it is considered a new session.  
__hssc| .gigs.com| [HubSpot](https://gigs.com/<https:/legal.hubspot.com/privacy-policy>)| 1 hour  
This cookie name is associated with websites built on the HubSpot platform. This cookie keeps track of sessions. This is used to determine if HubSpot should increment the session number and timestamps in the __hstc cookie. It contains the domain, viewCount (increments each pageView in a session), and session start timestamp.  
bcookie| .linkedin.com| [LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company](https://gigs.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy>)| 365 days  
This is a Microsoft MSN 1st party cookie for sharing the content of the website via social media.

Pedro Bridi,
Senior Product Manager, Nubank

![](https://gigs.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F231660%2F1029x648%2F5256830196%2Fnubank_card-30days.png&w=3840&q=75)
Then
The only path to launching a mobile service is via a mobile operator or a wholesaler. The process takes 12-15 months, costs millions, and requires dedicated in-house telecom engineering, regulatory and support teams. You aim to break even within a few years of launching, but there are no guarantees.
Now
Telecom has an operating system. Implementation happens in weeks, or even days. You get a positive return on investment from day one, and pay as you earn. Your focus is on customer experience and product innovation, not achieving high volume commitments to break even.

bcookie| .linkedin.com| LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company⟨59⟩| 365 days  
This is a Microsoft MSN 1st party cookie for sharing the content of the website via social media.  
**Marketing cookies**
Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites to allow publishers to display relevant and engaging advertisements. By enabling marketing cookies, you grant permission for personalized advertising across various platforms.
Marketing cookiesName| Hostname| Vendor| Expiry  
---|---|---|---  
_gcl_au| .gigs.com| Google Advertising Products⟨58⟩| 90 days  
Used by Google AdSense to understand user interaction with the website by generating analytical data.  
UserMatchHistory| .linkedin.com| LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company⟨59⟩| 30 days  
Contains a unique identifier used by LinkedIn to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
AnalyticsSyncHistory| .linkedin.com| LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company⟨59⟩| 30 days  
Used by LinkedIn to store information about the time a sync with the lms_analytics cookie took place for users in the Designated Countries  
bscookie| .www.linkedin.com| LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company⟨59⟩| 365 days  
Used by the social networking service, LinkedIn, for tracking the use of embedded services.  
IDE| .doubleclick.net| Google Advertising Products⟨58⟩| 390 days  
Used by Google's DoubleClick to serve targeted advertisements that are relevant to users across the web. Targeted advertisements may be displayed to users based on previous visits to a website. These cookies measure the conversion rate of ads presented to the user.  
test_cookie| .doubleclick.net| Google⟨56⟩| 1 hour  
Used to check if the user's browser supports cookies

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Gigs**

**Mission:** Gigs positions itself as "Stripe for phone plans," aiming to streamline the way businesses embed mobile connectivity into their offerings. 

**Overview:** Founded in 2020 as part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Gigs started with a simple premise: to build the operating system for mobile services. They’ve successfully created a platform that allows tech companies to integrate connectivity into their products with remarkable ease—imagine adding a connect button that issues SIM cards with just one click or API call.

**Team:** With a current team of about 90 employees, Gigs is notable for its diversity in expertise, drawing talent from heavyweights like Stripe, Airbnb, and Shopify. Their collective experience equips them to tackle the complex technical, operational, and regulatory hurdles intrinsic to mobile connectivity.

**Funding:** The company has raised nearly $100 million from prominent investors such as Ribbit Capital, Google, and Y Combinator, underscoring its status as one of the fastest-growing tech companies in the sector.

**Product Offerings:** Gigs provides an integrated suite of telecom products that enable businesses to launch their embedded wireless services. Key features include:
- **Connect:** A plug-and-play hosted checkout for wireless plans.
- **Payments:** An embedded multi-currency payments suite.
- **Operator:** A conversational AI assistant designed specifically for telecom.
- **Dashboard:** A powerful cockpit for managing connectivity and subscriptions.
- **API:** A best-in-class, multi-carrier telecom API.

Their solutions cater to various sectors, including fintech, HR tech, and broadband, allowing clients to offer services like employee phone plans, travel SIMs, and combined broadband/mobile packages.

**Growth Potential:** Positioned at a pivotal moment in its evolution, Gigs aims to leverage its foundation for hyper-growth over the next year. With a remote-first culture and hubs in major cities like San Francisco, London, and Berlin, Gigs is on the lookout for exceptional talent ready to tackle big challenges.

**Why Gigs Stands Out:** Unlike traditional telecom operations, which involve lengthy and costly setups, Gigs offers a streamlined model that can result in a positive ROI right out of the gate. This shift enables companies to focus on innovation and customer experience rather than navigating intricate telecom logistics.

**Website:** For more information, visit [gigs.com](https://gigs.com).

In short, Gigs is not just about connectivity; it's about empowerment—empowering businesses to enhance their offerings without the usual pain points associated with telecom services. If you're looking to embed mobile services seamlessly, Gigs might just be the way forward.
